job_purpose: Join a dynamic engineering team to develop enterprise-grade software, foster team collaboration, mentor peers, and deliver impactful results aligned with business objectives.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Produce quality code to raise the bar for the team on quality and speed
Interpret business requirements and ensure technical requirements are met
Write code, unit tests, build prototypes, solve issues, profile, and analyze bottlenecks
Manage and optimize scalable distributed systems on the cloud
Optimize applications for performance and scalability
Develop automated tests for regression testing
Communicate with stakeholders, project managers, QA teams, and developers on technology roadmap progress
Create and maintain workflows for consistent visual designs
required_qualifications: Degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience
Strong foundations in computer science, algorithms, and application design
Proficiency with AWS or Azure and cloud-native development
Expertise in designing RESTful APIs and developing with the MERN stack
Experience with Golang, Kubernetes, and Docker
Collaborative mindset with ability to work independently on mission-critical projects
Curiosity, growth mindset, and ability to challenge the status quo
company_details: DataMesh Group is revolutionizing payment systems for merchants and retailers, offering integrated payment capabilities and valuable customer insights through bespoke solutions. The company is in a growth phase, providing opportunities for impactful changes and career acceleration.
